sqlMap.sql: m.fe_employeeId, m.fo_employeeName, m.rfidcode, m.sex, m.mobile, m.telephone, m.address, m.email, m.org_id_label_cn
sqlMap.select:
select ,orderStr from ( select fe.cuid fe_employeeId, fo.label_cn fo_employeeName, fo.rfidcode, fe.sex, fe.mobile, fe.telephone, fe.address, fe.email, fon.label_cn org_id_label_cn, fon.cuid departmentId, '1' as orderStr from FW_OPERATOR fo, FW_EMPLOYEE fe,FW_ORGANIZATION fon where fo.cuid = fe.cuid and fe.org_id=fon.cuid(+)
and fo.cuid not in ($employeesId$)
)m
order by orderStr desc
select fo.cuid employeeId, fo.label_cn employeeName from FW_OPERATOR fo where cuid in (select t.employee_id from FW_ORGANIZATION_MANAGER t where org_id = #cuid#)
select t.org_id,t.employee_id,org.label_cn orgName,org.extend2 from fw_organization_manager t,fw_organization org where org.cuid=t.org_id and t.employee_id='$cuid$'

select distinct t.org_id, NULL AS employee_id, org.label_cn orgName,org.extend2 from fw_organization_manager t, fw_organization org where org.cuid = t.org_id and org.type='5'
AND t.employee_id = '$operatorId$'
org.extend1='$sorftType$'
order by t.org_id
sqlMap.insert:
insert into FW_ORGANIZATION_MANAGER (CUID, ORG_ID, EMPLOYEE_ID) values (#cuid#, #orgId#, #employeeId#)
select sys_guid() AS ID FROM DUAL
sqlMap.delete: delete from fw_organization_manager t where t.employee_id=#cuid#
